content.rendered:
Directed By Manish Mundra

Written By Haider Rizvi. Manish Mundra. Samah

Stars Rudra Pratap Singh Chaudhary (Suraj). Dev Chauhan (Pandey). Madhvendra Jha (Chote Bhaiya). Anuradha Kalia (Mamta). Shubham Kumar (Deepak Tiwari). Lajjawati Mishra (Daadi). Nidhi Mishra (Chachi). Ansh Pandey (Bachchan). Pooja Pandey. Yogesh Pandey (Lachman Chacha). Ambarish Saxena (Shankar). Rajshree Seem (Suman). Aradhya Sen (Pinky – Sister). Poornima Sharma. Vineet Kumar Singh. Aruna Soni (Asha). Rajnish Yadav (Chhotu).

Language Hindi. Tamil. Telugu. Malayalam

Producer Raghav Gupta. Kapil Madnani. Rashmi Somvanshi.

Production Drishyam Films
